description:
Both suspended FIFA president Sepp Blatter and UEFA boss Michel Platini could face a minimum seven-year bans from football, if found guilty of corruption claims. World Football's ethics committee submitted their report which investigated an alleged "disloyal payment" of around $2 million made by FIFA to Platini back in 2011. More details from our sports news correspondent Richard Conway.

"It could be a minimum of seven years that both men are facing if these allegations are proven, if the Hans-Joachim Eckert, the German judge who's looking at them now, agrees now that stems from the thought that conflict of interest. One of the charges that both men are up against has seen others who have been charged similarly get a ban of seven years. But of course, Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini face other charges, mismanagement, false accounting, and criticism of the ethics committee, so that seven years could well just be the starting point."

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

              

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Discount
Discount means a reduction from an original amount. What is the discount? Why is a discount given? What will be the result?
This week's topic: They received a discount... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) present a coupon to receive a discount
2) discount future cash flows
3) discount when buy in bulk
4) asking for a discount
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

By the time the pair returned to the main area, the club was already open for business. It was around early dinner time, so there were not yet many people at the club. To promote the early happy hour, there are various promotions, and drinks were on discount. As a result, there were still some people chatting and ordering drinks at the bar. The club manager brought the interior designer to the VIP area. A staff member approached and brought them the food menu. The interior designer looked at the well-designed menu.
